title: Plat diamond team looking for a serious mid laner for a serious competitive team
body:
I am part of a diamond/plat team we are a group of serious players that work off of a strict schedule. The main role we are looking for right now is a mid lane who is comfortable with a wide champ pool. Listen well and be confidence in calling shots if the need arises Again this team wants to win wants to improve and overall dominate there opponent if you don't have that kind of competitive attitude this might not be the team for you. please fill out this application we are trying people out tonight at around 9 to 8:30 est so if want to join please be on around that time notice we will not get to all applicants if there is a lot so please be patient.Must have mic and discord please if you don't have these things please don't fill out a application

Don't friend me i will after i read the applicants and respond at around 8;30 to 9
